levels.description:
Passive Effect: When a trap is triggered, <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> all surrounding targets and reduces the hit rate of Physical and Arts attacks by <@ba.vup>{damage_hitrate_physical:0%}</>, lasting for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</>s
Active Effect: Immediately gains 1 trap
